game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the lost artifact and return it to its rightful owner.
game.description: In a forgotten temple deep within the jungle, lies a valuable artifact that has been lost for centuries. Your mission is to locate the artifact and bring it back to the archaeologist who has been searching for it.

task.description: Travel to the village of Mysteria and speak to the wise elder who may have information about the whereabouts of the ancient map.
Once you have the ancient map, journey to the bottom of the treacherous Dragon's Cave to retrieve the sacred key that will unlock the temple where the artifact is hidden.
Use the sacred key to unlock the temple and navigate through its ancient traps and puzzles to find the long-lost artifact.
